mapper.select: select /** qms.AdmRolePgmAuth.selectByKey */ MNU_PGM_ID, ROLE_ID, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt from ADM_ROLE_PGM_AUTH where 1 = 1 and MNU_PGM_ID = #{mnuPgmId} and ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
select /** qms.AdmRolePgmAuth.selectAll */ MNU_PGM_ID, ROLE_ID, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt from ADM_ROLE_PGM_AUTH
mapper.insert: insert /** qms.AdmRolePgmAuth.insert */ into ADM_ROLE_PGM_AUTH( MNU_PGM_ID, ROLE_ID, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt ) values( #{mnuPgmId}, #{roleId}, #{createUser}, sysdate, #{updateUser}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update /** qms.AdmRolePgmAuth.update */ ADM_ROLE_PGM_AUTH set MNU_PGM_ID = #{mnuPgmId}, ROLE_ID = #{roleId}, upd_usr_id = #{updateUser}, upd_dt = sysdate where 1 = 1 and MNU_PGM_ID = #{mnuPgmId} and ROLE_ID = #{roleId}

update /** qms.AdmRolePgmAuth.updateWithMap */ ADM_ROLE_PGM_AUTH set
MNU_PGM_ID = #{mnuPgmId},
ROLE_ID = #{roleId},
upd_usr_id = #{updateUser}, upd_dt = sysdate where 1 = 1 and MNU_PGM_ID = #{mnuPgmId} and ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
